description.en:
Play ball!!
Ace and number four batter!
Kenichi Tachibana's battle for Koshien begins!
Authentic youth baseball manga first book version!

With the oath to my father, who was a groundskeeper at Koshien, and my promise to the Hadaka Nine, let's go, Kenichi!Naoki Tsuji The authentic baseball manga brought to you is here to begin!!

Synopsis
Kenichi Tachibana, a regular at Koshien and the ace of Namikawa High School,
After his father passes away, he decides to rely on his uncle and transfer to Tokyo.
Although he promises to play against the Hadaka Nine at Koshien,
the Daito High School baseball team he transferred to is weak...!?

Commentary
"Nagero Kenichi'', serialized in ``Bokura'' in 1964, is a baseball manga written by Naoki Tsuji.
In the same year, the TV anime of his masterpiece "0 Sen Hayato'' was broadcast, and
Naoki Tsuji was about to pursue a career as a popular manga artist. This is a work from around that time.
In keeping with the trend of baseball manga at the time, a "magic ball'' also appears,
The main character with a strong competitive spirit familiar from Tsuji's manga,
< a i=6>Aiming for Koshien from low school and high school, and then hitting the professional baseball world!The reader will be able to empathize with the story development. This first book edition includes all episodes and will be delivered to readers as a [complete version]. I want you to enjoy an authentic youth baseball manga like a fastball!
